uovision
Class GameWindow

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Window
                    |
                    +--java.awt.Frame
                          |
                          +--uovision.GameWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable
public class GameWindow
extends java.awt.Frame
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is the window in which game plays.
Currently it has only one component: GamePanel, but this may extend. In this version Mouse and keyboard capturing occurs here, and also the graphics are managaged by the window.

See Also:
